document_data.name: ''Cloak of Billowing''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''cloak of billowing''''' was a [[magic item|magical]] [[cloak]] that could spontaneously billow at its wearer's command.
document_data.Powers: The ''cloak of billowing'' had the ability to swell and wave dramatically as if under an ominous wind, requiring very little effort from its wearer. There was no limit to how many times this ability could be activated.
